sentences.english: They evolved into the chloroplasts of plants.
sentences.chinese: 這種轉化方式進化爲植物中的葉綠體。

sentences.english: The chloroplast envelope has the light yellow color of violaxanthin.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體的套膜有紫黃質的淡黃色。

sentences.english: The sequencing of the B. hypnoides complete chloroplast genome.
sentences.chinese: ⑵蘚羽藻葉綠體基因組全序列的測定。

sentences.english: Phosphoenolpyruvate carboxylase intrinsically located in the chloroplast of rice plays a crucial role in ammonium assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸羧化酶在水稻葉綠體形成中的作用。

sentences.english: Ribulose bisphosphate carboxylase was, therefore, a product controlled by both nuclear and chloroplast genes.
sentences.chinese: 該酶是受葉綠體和核基因聯合控制的產物。

sentences.english: Cell chloroplast density and higher granum lamellae decreased as well.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體高基粒片層逐漸減小。

sentences.english: Chloroplasts of the two cases exhibit spatially different patterns of motion during dielectrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 在實施介電泳時，兩者的葉綠體呈現不同型態的運動。

sentences.english: Choloroplast DNA has been widely used in plant systematics research.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體DNA在植物系統學研究中已得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: Chloroplast genetic transformation is a new way of plant genetic engineering.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體遺傳轉化是植物基因工程的新方向。

sentences.english: The inside of a chloroplast with the granum circled.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體的內部構造與顆粒盤旋。

sentences.english: The contents of 8 rare earth elements(REEs)in chloroplasts of Brassia napus were determined by instrumental neutron activation analysis.
sentences.chinese: 用中子活化分析測定了油菜葉綠體中的稀土元素含量。

sentences.english: In C4 plants there are two types of chloroplast.
sentences.chinese: 在C4植物中有兩種類型的葉綠體。

sentences.english: It is an early end product of photosynthesis, and is stored temporarily in the chloroplasts .
sentences.chinese: 是光合作用的早期終產物之一，暫時儲存於葉綠體內。

sentences.english: The light reactions take place on the thylakoid membranes of chloroplasts.
sentences.chinese: 光反應發生在葉綠體的類囊體膜上。

sentences.english: The influence of external vitamin C on chloroplast membrane lipid of cucumber ( Cucumis sativus L. ) has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了外源維生素C對黃瓜葉綠體膜脂過氧化的影響。

sentences.english: There were chloroplasts in Hodeum vulgare anthers.
